transcript: no one will remember you a lot of people take a lot of work and stress a lot about what other people think about them other people's opinions don't matter as much as I think they do for me reminding myself that I'm insignificant and in the long and eventual Universal scale am irrelevant allows me to look at my failures and laugh a little bit rather than say oh my God this is the end of the world it's really on a 500 milliony year time Horizon I am a being that exists for a blip of time and then will disappear from existence
